m_szDocTitle: Directory:Best Exotic Clean Energy Technologies - PESWiki
m_szDocSumamry: Directory:Best Exotic Clean Energy Technologies From PESWiki and Top 5 Exotic Free Energy Technologies Here at PESWiki we cover the entire spectrum of clean energy technologies, from conventional methods such as solar , wind , geothermal , tide , wave , river on the one hand; to very unconventional or "exotic" technologies such as magnet motors , overunity electromagnetic motors , gravity motors , cold fusion , and vortex technologies on the other. But in the past three years, we've shifted our focus to the exotic end of the spectrum, only covering the most significant breakthroughs on the con
